title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Upgrades for the Terrorbyte
content:
Owning the Garment Factory unlocks access to new upgrades for the Terrorbyte, so make sure you’ve got your own command truck from Warstock Cache & Carry.

Bureau Tech gives you exclusive mods to power-up your Terrorbyte with various new features such as managing all owned businesses, easily finding collectibles, and staying undetectable.

Purchase the Garment Factory from Maze Bank Foreclosures or walk up to the “For Sale” sign outside the property to start modding up your Terrorbyte.
